name: UNOVA - THE GAME
description:
Hi, my name is Giovanni, i'm brazilian and i'm learning how to program games from the beginning. If you want to help me embark on my career, think about a possible donation of any amount. I will be forever grateful! Enjoy my first prototype, UNOVA: THE GAME!

How to play:

Forward Arrow: Move Foward

Left Arrow: Turn Left

Right Arrow: Turn Right

SPACE: Shoot!

You have a shield embedded in the ship that will block 2 hits.

Easy Mode: Destroy 50 asteroids to win.

Hard Mode: Destroy 100 asteroids to win.

HAVE FUN!
